Name: Rusty Sidearm
Notes: Starting gun of The Hunter. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Marine Sidearm
Notes: Starting gun of The Marine. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Rogue Special
Notes: Fires short-range, inaccurate lasers. Starting gun of The Pilot. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Budget Revolver
Notes: Starting weapon of The Convict. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Dart Gun
Notes: Fires sticky darts. Starting weapon of The Cultist. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Robot's Right Hand
Notes: Starting weapon of The Robot. Does not reveal secret walls.

Name: Blasphemy
Notes: Starting weapon of The Bullet. Does not reveal secret walls. Swinging the sword destroys bullets and damages enemies. When at full health, swinging the sword also sends out a piercing sword projectile.

Name: Pea Shooter
Notes: Fires peas.

Name: Unfinished Gun
Notes: Shots pierce through enemies.

Name: Colt 1851
Notes: Fires a burst of two bullets.

Name: SAA
Notes: Fires bouncing bullets.

Name: Cold 45
Notes: Fires bullets that freeze enemies.

Name: Polaris
Notes: Has 3 levels. Killing enough enemies causes the gun to level up, increasing its damage. Taking damage decreases its level by 1.

Name: Dueling Pistol
Notes: Fires large bullets that bounce twice.

Name: AU Gun
Notes: Fires a single powerful bullet.

Name: Big Iron
Notes: Fires a random spread of three bullets.

Name: Composite Gun
Notes: Charged shot consumes two ammo and can pierce enemies.

Name: Flare Gun
Notes: Fires bullets that have a chance to set enemies on fire.

Name: Smiley's Revolver
Notes: Decreases shop prices while held. Fire rate increased shortly after rolling.

Name: Shades's Revolver
Notes: Increases the player's coolness while held, which decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

Name: Winchester
Quote: Better Than A Box Of Roses

Name: Rattler
Notes: Simultaneously fires a shotgun blast and a beam that has a chance to poison enemies.

Name: Elephant Gun
Notes: Fires a cone spread of bullets and has strong knockback.

Name: Tangler
Notes: Fires a shotgun blast of rectangular bullets that bounce off walls. Enemies hit will be folded into a rectangle.

Name: Mass Shotgun
Notes: Shoots a large slow projectile that will split up in a barrage of small bullets shortly afterwards.

Name: Shotgun Full of Hate
Notes: Shoots a shotgun burst of poison bullets that leave pools of poison goop.

Name: Shotgun Full of Love
Notes: Has a chance to Charm enemies.

Name: Shotgrub
Notes: Fires a spread of 5 bullets that leave small pools of poison goop.

Name: Gilded Hydra
Notes: Fires a large burst of piercing, bouncing bullets. Clip size is increased by 1 for each half heart the player is missing, and healing decreases clip size.

Name: Pulse Cannon
Notes: Fires a shotgun blast spread of 5 bullets

Name: Siren
Notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bullets that leave pools of water.

Name: Zilla Shotgun
Notes: Can be charged to fire the entire magazine at once, which will cause it to fire piercing, bouncing bullets.

Name: Ice Breaker
Notes: The first two shots fire a shotgun blast of ice bullets, and the final shop fires a single explosive shot.

Name: The Membrane
Notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bouncing green bullets that split into more bouncing green bullets.

Name: Huntsman
Notes: Fires shotgun blasts of bullets. Reloading swings the gun, destroying nearby bullets. Increases curse while held.

Name: Blooper
Notes: Fires shotgun blasts of blue bullets with high knockback.

Name: Bow
Notes: Pierces enemies when fully charged.

Name: Charmed Bow
Notes: Has a chance to Charm enemies.

Name: Crossbow
Notes: Fires bolts.

Name: Sticky Crossbow
Notes: Fires bolts that stick to the enemy and explode upon reloading.

Name: Shotbow
Notes: Fires a shotgun blast of bolts.

Name: Triple Crossbow
Notes: Reloading alternates between triple bolts and single bolts that slow enemies.

Name: Crescent Crossbow
Notes: Fires stars that split into smaller bouncing stars.

Name: Gunbow
Notes: Fires a fast, piercing projectile that ricochets many times.

Name: Klobbe
Notes: Rapidly fires low-damage bullets.

Name: AKEY-47
Notes: Shooting a locked chest or door unlocks it.

Name: M16
Notes: Reloading alternates between bursts of bullets and a grenade launcher.

Name: Zorgun
Notes: Rapidly fires homing bullets. The final bullet in each clip fires a random explosive (grenade, rocket, or drill).

Name: VertebraeK-47
Notes: Bullets close to each other will form links between each other, which hurts enemies on touch.

Name: MAC10
Notes: Fires a burst of four bullets.

Name: Heck Blaster
Notes: Rapidly fires invisible bullets that travel instantly.

Name: Patriot
Notes: Fires piercing bullets. Fire rate increases rapidly as the trigger is held.

Name: Plague Pistol
Notes: Fires bullets that leave poison goop on the ground and have a chance to poison enemies.

Name: Gungine
Notes: Greatly increases movement speed while held.

Name: Dragunfire
Notes: Rapidly fires burning bullets that have a chance to inflict Burn.

Name: Sniper Rifle
Notes: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

Name: A.W.P.
Notes: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

Name: M1
Notes: Bullets penetrate enemies.

Name: Corsair
Notes: Fires slow-moving bullets that accelerate and bounce around the room.

Name: Railgun
Notes: Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet that bounces many times.

Name: Deck4rd
Notes: Fires a single powerful bullet that will explode upon impact.

Name: The Judge
Notes: The final shot of each clip has a chance to poison, freeze or ignite enemies. (likely more effects possible)

Name: Alien Sidearm
Notes: Charged shots are larger and deal more damage.

Name: RUBE-ADYNE Prototype
Notes: Fires lasers that bounce four times.

Name: RUBE-ADYNE MK.II
Notes: Fires bouncing lasers with limited range.

Name: Mine Cutter
Notes: Reloading alternates between firing three small, piercing, parallel lasers and single large lasers.

Name: Flash Ray
Notes: Shoots lasers that pierce enemies. Has a chance to stun enemies.

Name: Wind Up Gun
Notes: The second half of each clip is slower and deals less damage (unconfirmed).

Name: H4mmer
Notes: Fires a barrage of bullets. The last shot in the magazine is a hammer, which deals extra damage and can stun enemies.

Name: Hegemony Carbine
Notes: Shoots rapid fire white bolts of energy.

Name: Fightsabre
Notes: Reloading swings the gun around, reflecting nearby bullets. Increases Curse while carried.

Name: Helix
Notes: Fires two bullets in a helix pattern.

Name: Laser Rifle
Notes: Fires a burst of three lasers.

Name: Crestfaller
Notes: Fires piercing bullets that slow and freeze enemies.

Name: Thunderclap
Notes: Fires balls of lightning.

Name: Charge Shot
Notes: Fires a large laser that pierces enemies and bounces off of walls.

Name: Dark Marker
Notes: Charge shot consumes the entire clip to create a room-wide explosion and blank effect.

Name: Particulator
Notes: Fires bullets in a small spread, which will then automatically seek out enemies.

Name: The Emperor
Notes: Fires a burst of four bullets connected by electricity.

Name: Grenade Launcher
Notes: Shoots a grenade that bounces off of surfaces and explodes on impact with enemies.

Name: Stinger
Notes: Fires homing rockets that explode into bees.

Name: Com4nd0
Notes: Fires homing rockets.

Name: RC Rocket
Notes: Fires rockets guided by the player's cursor.

Name: Yari Launcher
Notes: Rapidly fired homing rockets.

Name: Lil' Bomber
Notes: Fires a bomb that bounces off solid objects and explodes on enemy contact.

Name: Grasschopper
Notes: Fires a single powerful blast that has a very strong recoil.

Name: Bundle of Wands
Notes: Has a chance to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Staff of Firepower
Notes: Reloading alternates between a rapid fire pistol and a beam weapon that can set enemies on fire.

Name: Witch Pistol
Notes: Fires bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Hexagun
Notes: Fires piercing bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Phoenix
Notes: Firing a bullet creates a small cone of fire in front of the player that sets enemies on fire.

Name: Magic Lamp
Notes: Hitting an enemy three times causes a genie to punch them.

Name: Gunslinger's Ashes
Notes: Releases an armed spirit that attacks enemies.

Name: Luxin Cannon
Notes: Fires laser shots at enemies. When the magazine is emptied the tip of the crystal will be launched for extra damage.

Name: Gunther
Notes: Cannot be used to reveal hidden walls. Grows stronger with each room cleared.

Name: Unicorn Horn
Notes: Fires a rainbow beam that homes in on enemies. Increases Curse while carried.

Name: Cobalt Hammer
Notes: Fires blue lasers. Charging the weapon makes it fire lasers in four directions.

Name: Frost Giant
Notes: Fires big bullets that have a chance to freeze enemies.

Name: Bullet Bore
Notes: Fires drills that home in on enemies, stun them, and explode after a short delay.

Name: Megahand
Notes: Has 3 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

Name: Demon Head
Notes: Fires a continuous beam that has a chance to afflict Burn.

Name: Heroine
Notes: Has 3 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.

Name: Mutation
Notes: Fires a continuous beam and heavily pushes back the player.

Name: Flame Hand
Notes: Fires fireballs that pierce enemies and have a chance to set enemies on fire.

Name: Machine Fist
Notes: Reloading alternates between firing a gatling gun, and a single shot exploding rocket punch that is guided by the player's reticle. The rocket punch consumes 10 ammo upon firing.

Name: Snowballer
Notes: Fires snowballs that have a chance to freeze enemies.

Name: Super Meat Gun
Notes: Fires piercing, bouncing saw blades. Slightly increases movement speed while held.

Name: Anvillain
Notes: Fires piercing anvils that knock back and stun enemies.

Name: Fossilized Gun
Notes: Fires a stream of oil. Reloading causes the skull to spit fire, which can ignite the oil.

Name: Gamma Ray
Notes: Fires a green laser that has a chance to poison enemies.

Name: Freeze Ray
Notes: Fires a blue laser that has a chance to freeze enemies.

Name: Science Cannon
Notes: Fires a large laser after a short charge-up.

Name: Disintegrator
Notes: Fires a large laser after a long charge-up.

Name: Proton Backpack
Notes: Fires a homing laser.

Name: Mega Douser
Notes: Fires a stream of water.

Name: Plunger
Notes: Fires a stream of poison. Has a chance to Poison enemies and leaves poisonous puddles on the floor.

Name: Raiden Coil
Notes: Fires a laser that homes in on all on-screen enemies.

Name: Moonscraper
Notes: Fires a continuous laser that reflects when hitting anything solid for the first time.

Name: Barrel
Notes: Fires fish that have a chance to stun enemies and leave pools of water.

Name: Trick Gun
Notes: Reloading transforms the gun between a pistol and a shotgun.

Name: Mailbox
Notes: Fires mails at enemies, with the final bullet in the magazine being a package. The package can explode, leave confetti, Burn, or Poison enemies. (likely more things possible)

Name: Nail Gun
Notes: Fires a rapid stream of low damage nails. Fires faster if fire button is rapidly tapped rather than held.

Name: Light Gun
Notes: Fires zaps of light at enemies. The last bullet in the magazine is a duck, which will automatically seek out the nearest enemy and attack them.

Name: Mahoguny
Notes: Fires bouncing wood bullets along with several leaves.

Name: The Scrambler
Notes: Fires bullets that hatch into many homing bullets upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

Name: Trashcannon
Notes: Fires a trash bag that explodes into poison projectiles that leave trails of poison goop.

Name: Glacier
Notes: Fires bouncing ice cubes that explode and freeze enemies.

Name: Origuni
Notes: Fires paper planes that follow the player's crosshair.

Name: The Kiln
Notes: Fires pots that break into 3 bouncing crystals upon hitting something.

Name: Skull Spitter
Notes: Fires homing skulls.

Name: Buzzkill
Notes: Fires piercing, bouncing sawblades.

Name: Tear Jerker
Notes: Fires tears that leave behind puddles of water.

Name: Eye of the Beholster
Notes: The last shot of each clip spawns a friendly Beadie.

Name: Molotov Launcher
Notes: Fires molotovs that set areas on fire.

Name: Shock Rifle
Notes: Fires a zap of electricity.

Name: Bait Launcher
Notes: Fires a steak that causes a tiger to appear and maul the target.

Name: Brick Breaker
Notes: Fires turtle shells which pierce through enemies and bounce off of walls.

Name: Betrayer's Shield
Notes: Upon reloading, leaves a protective shield on the ground. Players in that area will be protected until the shield has absorbed a number of bullets.

Name: Lower Case r
Notes: Fires a burst of 6 bullets that spell out the word bullet.

Name: Excaliber
Notes: Fires a burst of three piercing sword projectiles. Reloading swings the sword, destroying nearby bullets. Increases curse while held.

Name: Face Melter
Notes: Simultaneously fires music notes in four directions. Places an amplifier on the ground at the player's position upon reloading. Whenever the Face Melter is fired, the amplifier will fire music notes in the same pattern. Reloading again will remove the amplifier and place a new one.

Name: Trident
Notes: Fires a long-range laser that pierces one enemy.

Name: Abyssal Tentacle
Notes: Fires a tentacle that homes in on and grips enemies, damaging them.

Name: Quad Laser
Notes: Fires a large, square bullet that moves extremely slowly.

Name: Pitchfork
Notes: Fires fireballs that have a chance to Burn enemies.

Name: Gungeon Ant
Notes: Reloading alternates between firing spreads of bullets that leave behind oil and flaming bullets.

Name: Alien Engine
Notes: Rapid fire weapon that has a very short range, only damaging enemies that come into contact with the muzzle flash. Enemies damaged have a chance to catch on fire. Extremely high recoil.

Name: Microtransaction Gun
Notes: Shoots green gems at the cost of 1 coin per shot

Name: T-Shirt Cannon
Notes: Fires t-shirts that have significant knockback.

Name: Banana
Notes: Fires an explosive banana that sends out three more bouncing explosive bananas.

Name: Bee Hive
Notes: Fires bees that home in on and damage enemies.

Name: Silencer
Notes: Fires zippers. Hitting an enemy with the swing of the weapon will stun the enemy.

Name: Camera
Notes: Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to stun enemies.

Name: Sling
Notes: Fires rocks that bounce once.

Name: Cactus
Notes: Fires needles.

Name: Black Hole Gun
Notes: Fires black holes that attract enemies and enemy bullets.

Name: BSG
Notes: Slowly charges up to fire a large high-damage projectile.

Name: Compressed Air Tank
Notes: Fires sharks that swim around the room, seeking enemies and biting them.

Name: Serious Cannon
Notes: Fires large bouncing cannonballs.
